Dart JavaScript Interop Samples

The following samples show common JavaScript APIs accessed from Dart. They run natively in Dartium and via Dart2JS compilation in modern browsers.

Google Charts API - bubblechart.html
bubblechart.dart
Google Maps / Directions API - directions.html
directions.dart
Twitter Search via JSONP - twitter.html
twitter.dart

https://github.com/dart-lang/js-interop
